title: [Large-Scale] Blended Learning-Based Teacher Training Program to Strengthen Early Childhood STEM Education Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of early childhood education and foundational understanding of elementary STEM concepts
context.additional_context: Necessity of developing competencies to apply creative teaching methods without gender bias to activate STEM education in early childhood education settings.

learning_goals: A gender-neutral approach is applied in designing STEM educational activities for young children in over 80% of cases.
Mobile microlearning platforms are used to create STEM educational materials for young children at least twice monthly.
Three STEM project prototypes for young children are developed and implemented in the field within three months.
Educators' self-efficacy is improved by at least 20% compared to baseline assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
